bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🌸 I collect nectar.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often found in gardens.
🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🍀 Many people wish on me

bug.question: I hop around and have strong legs. I love to eat plants and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often green.
🎶 I make a noise by rubbing my legs together.
🦗 I belong to the family Caelifera

bug.question: I build tunnels underground and carry food back to my colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but strong.
💪 I work with many others.
🏠 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I can be found in corners and gardens.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🪰 My webs helps to catch flies.

bug.question: I start as a worm-like creature and transform into a beautiful flying insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I am young.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I go through metamorphosis.

bug.question: I am a buzzing insect that bites and drinks blood. I am often found near water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 Some types of me can spread diseases.
🧛 Female ones need blood to lay eggs.
💦 I lay my eggs in water.

bug.question: I live in the water and have a long body with many legs. I can swim very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🐉 I'm not really a dragon, though some people call me a nymph.
💧 I eat mosquito larvae.
🦋 When I grow up, I become a beautiful insect.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I look like a twig or a leaf to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My camouflage is very impressive.
🚶 I'm very slow.
🌳 I am from the order Phasmatodea.

bug.question: I am a nocturnal insect that glows in the dark. I use my light to attract a mate. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be found in forests and fields at night.
💡 My light is produced by a chemical reaction.
🔦 I am a type of beetle.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. I stop to let people on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🚶‍♀️ I help people get around without walking.
🛑 I have a route with many stops.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and can carry lots of people or things across long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I often have a whistle.
🛤️ I need a special path to move.
🧳 I am useful for long trips.

transport.question: I float on water and help you cross the sea or a river. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I do not have wheels.
⚓️ I need a special place to park.
⛵️ I can be big or small.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
💺 You can sit down inside me.
✈️ I need a runway to take off and land.

transport.question: I have two wheels, a seat, and pedals. You use your feet to make me move. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴‍♀️ You can do tricks on me!
🔔 I often have a bell.
🛣️ You can ride me on a path.

transport.question: I am a car that takes you anywhere for a fee, I often have a light on my roof. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 You pay me to take you places.
📍 You can call me to come and get you.
🚦 I drive on the road.

transport.question: I travel underground and carry many people quickly through the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You need to go down stairs to reach me.
⏱️ I am a fast way to travel.
📍 I stop at stations along my route.

transport.question: I am very fast and used in emergencies. I have a siren that makes a loud noise. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I help people.
🚑 I might have a stretcher inside.
🏥 You might see me outside of a hospital.

transport.question: I carry goods all over the world, traveling on the ocean, and am much bigger than a boat. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I carry lots of containers.
🚢 I am too big for a lake.
🌊 I travel across vast bodies of water.

transport.question: I travel to space and can take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I'm the fastest of all.
👩‍🚀 I carry people who wear special suits.
🌌 I leave the Earth's atmosphere.
